modName: Storms - Automatic Variants for Storm Atronach
descriptionHtml:
Just something I whipped up while messing around with automatic variants, this mod adds 6 textures for the storm atronach base, and 5 glow textures. The base and glow are combined randomly, and the result is a possible 30 new storm atronachs to look at!

Requirements|
--------------------
You must, must, must have Automatic Variants by Leviathan1753.
You can find it here http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21377/?

Installation: drop data into your data folder and merge, or use NMM. Then, run the Automatic Variants patcher, and enable my texture pack. Create the patch, and you're done! Enjoy your new atronachs.
author: AfroCircus
